channel.title: Capital on Blanka's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Capital on Blanka's Travel Blog

item.title: Aosta
item.description: Ahh, Aosta. Quelle magnifique! Can you imagine a small town in the valley surrounded by snow-peaked mountains, singing birds, alpine architecture and roman remains?

item.title: Milano
item.description: Milano. If you tell anyone that you are in Milano, the general reaction is “ooo, how lucky you are what a beautiful city!

item.title: Torino
item.description: I would have never imagined that one can find it pleasant to live in a big city.
